author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE CONTINUES WESTWARD WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
summary:
...HONE CONTINUES WESTWARD WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
 As of 11:00 PM HST Tue Aug 27
 the center of Hone was located near 20.4, -167.8
 with movement W at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
